text.div:
Acknowledgment code

Code Description Deutsch (German) Nederlands (Dutch) Comment Version
aa Original mode: Application Accept - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Accept akzeptiert durch Anwendung Original modus: Applicatiebevestiging - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: accepteer from v2.1
ae Original mode: Application Error - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Error Fehler in Anwendung Original modus: Applicatiefout - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: fout from v2.1
ar Original mode: Application Reject - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Reject Abgelehnt durch Anwendung Original modus: Applicatieweigering - Enhanced modus: Applicatiebevestiging: weiger from v2.1
ca Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit Accept Bei Eingangsprüfung akzeptiert ("committed") Enhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: accepteer ontvangst added v2.2
ce Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit Error Fehler bei Eingangsprüfung Enhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: fout in ontvangst added v2.2
cr Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit Reject Bei Eingangsprüfung abgelehnt Enhanced modus: Ontvangstbevestiging: weigering te ontvangen added v2.2

name: v2 Acknowledgment code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0008 ( Acknowledgment code)
